title: "Healthcare consumers conditioned not to shop for best prices, study says"
excerpt: "Fifty-eight percent of respondents said they would research their options and shop for the best price if pricing information was disclosed before necessary healthcare procedures and services. \"There's clearly a gap between what many healthcare organizations — providers and insurance companies — think helps increase price transparency and the experience of patients in finding price information conveniently and in a manner that is easy to understand,"
